name: Blockworks Daily
title: Utf8b8jfqg Friday Eventful Charts
text:
Synopsis
The current economic landscape is characterized by complex geopolitical dynamics, with potential trade tensions and significant AI infrastructure investments reshaping global economic strategies.

Key Insights
- US jobs market remains strong, with January nonfarm payrolls at +143k and labor force participation rising
- Inflation expectations have increased, with 1-year inflation expectations jumping to 4.3% and 5-year expectations rising to 3.3%
- Tech sector is projected to invest approximately $3 trillion in AI infrastructure over the next few years
- Amazon plans to spend roughly $100 billion on AI infrastructure this year
- The Magnificent 7 tech companies increased capital expenditure by 40% last year, while the rest of the S&P 500 increased by only 3.5%
- US consumption represents 29% of global consumption but only 15% of global manufacturing output, contrasting with China's 12% consumption and 32% manufacturing output
- Market volatility appears low, with VIX at 16, suggesting minimal concern about potential trade wars or economic disruptions
- Inflows into US equities have accelerated since the election, indicating continued investor confidence
